updates.title: Figma acquires AI-powered media generation company Weavy, expanding its AI capabilities with plans to integrate into the Figma platform under the Weave brand.
Nvidia becomes first public company worth $5 trillion while reportedly investing up to $1 billion in AI coding company Poolside, highlighting massive enterprise AI investment momentum.
ElevenLabs CEO predicts AI audio models will become 'commoditized' over time, signaling a shift toward platform and application differentiation in the voice AI space.
Apple Intelligence expands AI integrations as Tim Cook confirms plans to embed more third-party AI tools into Apple's operating systems, opening new opportunities for AI developers.

Character.AI ends chatbot experience for minors following safety concerns and lawsuits, while Grammarly rebrands to 'Superhuman' and launches new AI assistant after acquiring the Superhuman email client.
